name: checkpoint-llm-demo
description: Single-step LLM workflow demonstrating checkpoint/resume with real AI generation
specification:
Write a Python function `render_template(template: str, context: dict) -> str` that implements a simple template engine:
1. Replace `{{ variable }}` with the value from context dict. If the variable is not in context, leave the placeholder unchanged.
2. Support basic conditionals: `{% if variable %}text{% endif %}`. If variable exists in context and is truthy, include the text. Otherwise, remove the entire block.
3. You can use regex for matching patterns.
constraints: Use Python. Function must be named exactly `render_template`. Use only standard library (re module is fine). Handle edge cases.
